name: University of Toronto
description: The EASI API (Enterprise Applications and Solutions Integration API) was developed to allow staff members of the University of Toronto to programatically access the ROSI (Repository of Student Information). ROSI publishes via the web, using protocols that are XML-based. Unlike other web services designed for machine to machine interaction on a network, EASI is developed only as the service is needed. Web services are accessed through a SOAP interface.
